abstract: Jules Allen went to Gleason's Gym to train. He stayed to make pictures of a smoke-filled world where boxing champs duked it out daily amid dreamers and hustlers, the up and coming and the down and out.
snippet: Jules Allen went to Gleason's Gym to train. He stayed to make pictures of a smoke-filled world where boxing champs duked it out daily amid dreamers and hustlers, the up and coming and the down and out.

headline.main: The Sweet Science of Body and Soul
